name: Wemoji: Social VR Chat & Games
description:
Ready to become your Wemoji and meet cool people? Enter a new immersive 3D social experience and community for self-expression and fun! Who will you be? Where will you go? Who will you meet? Jump into this vrchat to find out.

Follow us
IG @wemojichat
Twitter @wemojichat

prob/idea/feedback/love letter? Text us (857) 626-6883 or email hey@wemoji.co
